  • Material (pyrit.material)
  • View page source

Material (pyrit.material)

This module handles materials.

Materials and container class

Materials(*mats)

Class that manages materials of a problem

Conductivity(value[, name])

Class that represents the conductivity \(\sigma\) in S/m.

Density(value[, name])

Class that represents the density

VolumetricHeatCapacity(value[, name])

Class that represents the volumetric heat capacity \(c_v = \rho c_p\) (German: Wärmespeicherzahl)

Permeability(value[, name])

Class that represents the permeability \(\mu=\mu_{\mathrm{r}} \mu_0\)

Permittivity(value[, name])

Class that represents the Permittivity \(\varepsilon=\varepsilon_{\mathrm{r}} \varepsilon_0\)

Reluctivity(value[, name])

Class that represents the Reluctivity \(\nu=\mu^{-1}\)

ThermalConductivity(value[, name])

Class that represents the thermal conductivity \(\lambda\)

Resistivity(value[, name])

Class representing the resistivity \(\rho=\sigma^{-1}\)

DifferentialConductivity(value[, name])

Class that represents the differential conductivity \(\boldsymbol{\frac{\mathrm{d} J}{\mathrm{d} E}}\).

DifferentialPermittivity(value[, name])

Class that represents the differential permittivity \(\boldsymbol{\frac{\mathrm{d} D}{\mathrm{d} E}}\).

Abstract classes

Mat(name, *props)

Class that represents a specific material.

MatProperty(value[, name])

Abstract class for material properties.

Exceptions

PropertyConversionException

Exception when it comes to an error during the conversion of MatProperty objects.
